criterion: Mentions the importance of proper wound care for the scratch
Incorrectly states that vaccinations guarantee no infections
Asks for more information about the user's vaccination schedule
Provides natural language and clear instructions
Recommends applying antibiotic ointment and keeping the wound clean
Mentions the possibility of allergic reactions to certain antibiotics
Asks the user if they have any allergies or concerns before providing treatment advice
Incorrectly advises the user to use over-the-counter antiseptic wipes
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the recommended treatment
Fails to mention the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms worsen or persist
